column4: on http://forum.sopcast.org/forum/viewtopic.php?p=8631 I get lost on step 2
when i download all these things i get a lot of RAR files and when i extract them i have no idea what to do with them
so I guess my root question is how do I become a ninja with Ubuntu?
Sharpen live CDs into shurikens, and yield ps2 cables as whips.
